GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v6.0.13
GSD.description:
xen/netback: don't call kfree_skb() with interrupts disabled

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.13 by commit 3fb02db125bbcf8163e9e30d2824b4adf13f06cb, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit be81992f9086b230623ae3ebbc85ecee4d00a3d3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: xen/netback: don't call kfree_skb() with interrupts disabled
OSV.details:
xen/netback: don't call kfree_skb() with interrupts disabled
